record.field: for record in self: record['x_company_partner_id'] = record.partner_id and record.partner_id == record.company_id.partner_id

for record in self: #TODOVAVA account = self.env['account.analytic.account'].search([('partner_id', '=', record.x_owner), ('x_property', '=', record.x_property), ('x_end_date', '=', False)], limit=1) record['x_account'] = account.id
for record in self: record['x_is_main_company'] = self.env.ref('base.main_company').id in self.env.companies.ids

for record in self: #TODOVAVA check voting_key = record.event_id.x_voting_key record['x_ratio'] = sum(voting_key.x_ratio_ids.filtered(lambda l: l.x_owner == record.partner_id).mapped('x_ratio')) if voting_key else 0.0
for record in self: record['x_attending_owners'] = len([a for a in record.attendee_ids if a.x_attending or a.x_delegating])
for line in self: line['x_share'] = (line.x_amount / line.x_split_analytic_items_id.x_total) * 100
for record in self: record['x_share_total'] = sum(line.x_share for line in record.x_line_ids)

#TODOVAVA for record in self: voting_key = record.x_voting_key attendees = record.attendee_ids if not (attendees and voting_key and record.x_condominium): record['x_attending_ratio'] = 0.0 continue attending_ratio = sum(attendees.filtered(lambda a: a.x_attending or a.x_delegating).mapped('x_ratio')) total_ratio = sum(voting_key.x_ratio_ids.mapped('x_ratio')) record['x_attending_ratio'] = (attending_ratio / total_ratio if total_ratio > 0 else 1.0)
